price: (Do t’u thuhet): “Shijoni dënimin tuaj! Këtë kërkuat t’ju shpejtohet!”
arabic: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: dhūqū fit'natakum hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tastaʿjilūna
